item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, April 3, 2025 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: OpenNutrition – A free, public nutrition database (59 points | 25 comments)
2. US Administration announces 34% tariffs on China, 20% on EU (1174 points | 1991 comments)
3. I maintain a 17 year old ThinkPad (384 points | 337 comments)
4. An AlphaStation's SROM (11 points | discuss)
5. InitWare, a portable systemd fork running on BSDs and Linux (16 points | 4 comments)
6. Show HN: Zxc – Rust TLS proxy with tmux and Vim as UI, BurpSuite alternative (12 points | 2 comments)
7. Web Server for AoE 1, 2 and 3 DE supporting LAN multiplayer 100% offline (352 points | 63 comments)
8. An open source, self-hosted implementation of the Tailscale control server (228 points | 54 comments)
9. Type (YC W23) is hiring a senior software engineer ( | hide)
10. Pico.sh – SSH powered services for developers (468 points | 100 comments)
11. Minimal CSS-only blurry image placeholders (327 points | 50 comments)
12. Animals Made from 13 Circles (2016) (555 points | 105 comments)
13. How North Korea Cheated Its Way to Crypto Billions (24 points | 7 comments)
14. Dijkstra On the foolishness of "natural language programming" (176 points | 112 comments)
15. Why I don't discuss politics with friends (290 points | 548 comments)
16. AI/Math Puzzle (11 points | 4 comments)
17. MIT 6.5950 Secure Hardware Design – An open-source course on hardware attacks (178 points | 12 comments)
18. Apple's Cubify Anything: Scaling Indoor 3D Object Detection (143 points | 18 comments)
19. Flame – BBS and MUD (37 points | 8 comments)
20. Tell HN: Announcing tomhow as a public moderator (1689 points | 440 comments)
21. Restructuring Announcement (222 points | 186 comments)
22. Multi-Token Attention (124 points | 32 comments)
23. Search-R1: Training LLMs to Reason and Leverage Search Engines with RL (78 points | 7 comments)
24. How Google built its Gemini robotics models (175 points | 66 comments)
25. Digital Archivists: Protecting Public Data from Erasure (182 points | 44 comments)
26. Ploopy Classic 2 open source trackball (105 points | 41 comments)
27. When Jorge Luis Borges met one of the founders of AI (145 points | 45 comments)
28. Show HN: Mermaid Chart VS Code Plugin: Mermaid.js Diagrams in Visual Studio Code (115 points | 48 comments)
29. Hacking the call records of millions of Americans (127 points | 26 comments)
30. Ask HN: Who is hiring? (April 2025) (222 points | 313 comments)
